images.alt_text: AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Barcelona in summer, showcasing its vibrant beaches and iconic Gaudi architecture.
AI-selected These promotional icons will enhance the promotional aspect of the email, guiding users through the booking process and encouraging engagement.

AI-selected The logo will be placed in the header to establish brand identity and trust, reinforcing the campaign's promotional message.
AI-selected This background pattern will create a vibrant and sunny atmosphere for the email, enhancing the overall visual appeal and aligning with the summer theme.

assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Barcelona in summer
assetRequirements.visual_style: bright, colorful, and dynamic reflecting summer festivities
assetRequirements.content_context: depicting the beaches, architecture of Gaudi, and summer festivals in Barcelona

assetRequirements.purpose: showcase the cultural and architectural highlights of Barcelona
assetRequirements.visual_style: artistic and elegant, focusing on Gaudi's architecture
assetRequirements.content_context: highlighting famous landmarks like Sagrada Familia and Park Güell

assetRequirements.purpose: illustrate the summer vibe and activities available in Barcelona
assetRequirements.visual_style: sunny and cheerful, featuring beach scenes and festivals
assetRequirements.content_context: showing people enjoying the beach and local festivals

usageInstructions.placement: Place at top of email as main header image with full width
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Летний отдых в Барселоне: забронируйте сейчас!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Barcelona in summer, showcasing its vibrant beaches and iconic Gaudi architecture.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
